source.name: IBRD Credit Exposure by Counterparty Rating as of June 30, 2010

datasets.name: Amount (US$ Millions)
datasets.description: Provides data on investment commercial credit exposure for IBRD and IDA. The values are shown net of collateral held. For IBRD, the decrease in credit exposure in FY2010 reflects a decrease in the size of the IBRD investment program due to decrease in liquidity held and a relatively smaller decrease in IBRD's net swap exposure.

datasets.name: Credit Exposure by Counterparty Rating as of June 30, 2010
IDA: Commercial Credit Exposure by Counterparty Rating
datasets.description: IDA's commercial credit risk is concentrated in investments in debt instruments issued by sovereign governments, agencies, banks, and corporate entities. The vast majority of these investments are in AAA and AA rated instruments. The credit exposure amounts for each category are shown net of collateral held.

datasets.name: IBRD: Commercial Credit Exposure by Counterparty Rating
datasets.description: IBRD’s commercial credit risk is concentrated in investments in debt instruments issued by sovereign governments, agencies, banks, and corporate entities. The vast majority of these investments are in AAA and AA rated instruments. The credit exposure amounts for each category are shown net of collateral held.
